Text: Thanks for the information. I've wanted to try Quake 3 map making for ages.
:) I actually wanted to make a torrent too but I messed it up and now my ip has changed WAH!.

1.5 isn't that buggy!!!
I've been using it for TCE(an Enemy Territory mod) for a long time and I haven't had any problems. but u might wanna install 1.4 too, to compile.

BTW, this kinda stuf can also been downed from the official radiant site. Might go faster for some ppl...
